Subsection.Text: A dissociated partner or the partnership may file a statement of dissociation stating:

Paragraph.Text: The name of the partnership as identified in the records of the Department of State.
That the partner is dissociated from the partnership.

Subsection.Text: A statement of dissociation may be filed without regard to the provisions of s. 620.8105(4) if it states that no partnership registration statement has been filed with the Department of State.
A statement of dissociation is a limitation on the authority of a dissociated partner for purposes of s. 620.8303(4) and (5).
For purposes of ss. 620.8702(1)(c) and 620.8703(2)(c), a person who is not a partner is deemed to have notice of the dissociation 90 days after a statement of dissociation is filed.
